title: Text Difference
description: Type or paste text into both fields to check the difference.
jsonInvalid: Please ensure you entered a valid JSON object

characters.label: Characters
characters.description: Two blocks of text, comparing character by character.

charactersIgnoreCase.label: Characters Ignore Case
charactersIgnoreCase.description: Two blocks of text, comparing character by character ignoring case.

words.label: Words
words.description: Two blocks of text, comparing word by word, ignoring whitespace.

wordsIgnoreCase.label: Words Ignore Case
wordsIgnoreCase.description: Two blocks of text, comparing word by word, ignoring case.

wordsWithSpace.label: Words with Space
wordsWithSpace.description: Two blocks of text, comparing word by word, treating whitespace as significant.

trimmedLines.label: Trimmed Lines
trimmedLines.description: Two blocks of text, comparing line by line.

sentences.label: Sentences
sentences.description: Two blocks of text, comparing sentence by sentence.

css.label: CSS
css.description: Two blocks of text, comparing CSS tokens

json.label: JSON
json.description: Two JSON objects, comparing the fields defined on each. The order of fields, etc does not matter in this compparsion.
